name: Squid Game Runner
description:
Squid Game Runner 3D is a fun runner in the style of the famous squid game! A super fun run race is waiting for you!

You run in a pink soldier costume, your task is to collect as many points and coins as possible! 

But be careful! The speed increases all the time and it becomes more hard to run and avoid obstacles!  

Set new records, keep an eye on obstacles, collect coins and enjoy this runner 3d game!

The game has beautiful, but not demanding graphics, thanks to which the game will run even on weak and old devices!

Movement: Swipes and touches
